name: Marie Vaunt
cleanBio: Marie Vaunt is a Japanese-American Techno producer and DJ currently based in Los Angeles. With her unique blend of massive rhythms, dark and ethereal vocals, and genre-defining acid lines, she has gained a large following, amassing 3.2 million Spotify streams in 2022, while also being a regular on the Beatport Techno Top 100 chart. Marie has released on some of Techno's most respected labels including Drumcode, Revealed Recordings, Fe Chrome, Kneaded Pains, Autektone, Legend, Codex, and Alaula. She has also made official remixes for artists such as Cosmic Boys, Dense & Pika, T78, A\*S\*Y\*S, and Kai Tracid, and has received support from industry heavyweights Adam Beyer, Hardwell, Maddix, Sian, A\*S\*Y\*S and Amelie Lens, to name a few. In addition to her success as a producer, Marie has also made a name for herself as a performer, bringing her signature sound to stages in countries including Japan, Switzerland, Austria, Germany, Portugal, Spain, and the United States. Marie Vaunt has solidified her place in the Techno scene as a household name, and continues to push boundaries with her unique and innovative sound.
